queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{service:handshake AND http.status_code IN (400,401,403,404,406,409) AND resource_name:next::edu::*} by {http.status_code}.as_count()

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{service:handshake AND http.status_code IN (500,502,503,504) AND resource_name:next::edu*} by {http.status_code,resource_name}.as_count()

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{service:handshake AND http.status_code IN (400,401,403,404) AND resource_name:next::edu*} by {http.status_code,resource_name}.as_count()

definition.title: P95 ES get requests by index

requests.q: derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.fetch.time{es-cluster-name:production-universities} by {node_name}), derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.query.time{es-cluster-name:production-universities} by {node_name}), derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.query.total{es-cluster-name:production-universities} by {node_name}), (derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.fetch.time{es-cluster-name:production-universities} by {node_name})+derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.query.time{es-cluster-name:production-universities} by {node_name}))*1000/derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.query.total{es-cluster-name:production-universities} by {node_name})

definition.title: Doc Count by Index (Production Cluster Only)
Shard Sizes Per Index - US Production
P95 ES get requests by index
Shard Sizes Per Index - UK Production

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:handshake.document_updater.upserted{$env AND $region AND cluster:universities AND source:label OR source:bulk_label}.as_count().rollup(count, 86400)

definition.title: Daily Upserts From Label Changes (Label and BulkLabel)
Upserts By Index and Source and Priority
